segments.text: A friend of mine is now in the big house . He was caught red-handed for selling cocaine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is a deadly risky business . He should have it coming on him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He must be regretting about having done the business .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bet he is . He domed his own life .
segments.speaker: S2
